operation.name: mc_login
operation.documentation: Log the user in and get their information.

operation.name: mc_enum_status
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for statuses.

operation.name: mc_enum_priorities
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for priorities.

operation.name: mc_enum_severities
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for severities.

operation.name: mc_enum_reproducibilities
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for reproducibilities.

operation.name: mc_enum_projections
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for projections.

operation.name: mc_enum_etas
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for ETAs.

operation.name: mc_enum_resolutions
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for resolutions.

operation.name: mc_enum_access_levels
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for access levels.

operation.name: mc_enum_project_status
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for project statuses.

operation.name: mc_enum_project_view_states
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for project view states.

operation.name: mc_enum_view_states
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for view states.

operation.name: mc_enum_custom_field_types
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for custom field types.

operation.name: mc_enum_get
operation.documentation: Get the enumeration for the specified enumeration type.

operation.name: mc_issue_exists
operation.documentation: Check there exists an issue with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_issue_get
operation.documentation: Get the issue with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_issues_get
operation.documentation: Get all issues matching the ids.

operation.name: mc_issues_get_header
operation.documentation: Get all issues header matching the ids.

operation.name: mc_issue_get_history
operation.documentation: Get the history of the issue with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_issue_get_biggest_id
operation.documentation: Get the latest submitted issue in the specified project.

operation.name: mc_issue_get_id_from_summary
operation.documentation: Get the id of the issue with the specified summary.

operation.name: mc_issue_add
operation.documentation: Submit the specified issue details.

operation.name: mc_issue_update
operation.documentation: Update Issue method.

operation.name: mc_issue_set_tags
operation.documentation: Sets the tags for a specified issue.

operation.name: mc_issue_delete
operation.documentation: Delete the issue with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_issue_note_add
operation.documentation: Submit a new note.

operation.name: mc_issue_note_delete
operation.documentation: Delete the note with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_issue_note_update
operation.documentation: Update a specific note of a specific issue.

operation.name: mc_issue_relationship_add
operation.documentation: Submit a new relationship.

operation.name: mc_issue_relationship_delete
operation.documentation: Delete the relationship for the specified issue.

operation.name: mc_issue_attachment_add
operation.documentation: Submit a new issue attachment.

operation.name: mc_issue_attachment_delete
operation.documentation: Delete the issue attachment with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_issue_attachment_get
operation.documentation: Get the data for the specified issue attachment.

operation.name: mc_project_add
operation.documentation: Add a new project to the tracker (must have admin privileges)

operation.name: mc_project_delete
operation.documentation: Delete a project from the tracker (must have admin privileges)

operation.name: mc_project_update
operation.documentation: Update a specific project to the tracker (must have admin privileges)

operation.name: mc_project_get_id_from_name
operation.documentation: Get the id of the project with the specified name.

operation.name: mc_project_get_issues_for_user
operation.documentation: Get the issues filtered by the specified user within the specified project. Supported types include "assigned", "monitored", "reported". Pass "-1" for the per_page parameter to get all issues. Use project id "0" for all projects.

operation.name: mc_project_get_issues
operation.documentation: Get the issues that match the specified project id and paging details. Pass "-1" for the per_page parameter to get all issues.

operation.name: mc_project_get_issue_headers
operation.documentation: Get the issue headers that match the specified project id and paging details. Pass "-1" for the per_page parameter to get all issues.

operation.name: mc_project_get_users
operation.documentation: Get appropriate users assigned to a project by access level.

operation.name: mc_projects_get_user_accessible
operation.documentation: Get the list of projects that are accessible to the logged in user.

operation.name: mc_project_get_categories
operation.documentation: Get the categories belonging to the specified project.

operation.name: mc_project_add_category
operation.documentation: Add a category of specific project.

operation.name: mc_project_delete_category
operation.documentation: Delete a category of specific project.

operation.name: mc_project_rename_category_by_name
operation.documentation: Rename a category of specific project.

operation.name: mc_project_get_versions
operation.documentation: Get the versions belonging to the specified project.

operation.name: mc_project_version_add
operation.documentation: Submit the specified version details.

operation.name: mc_project_version_update
operation.documentation: Update version method.

operation.name: mc_project_version_delete
operation.documentation: Delete the version with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_project_get_released_versions
operation.documentation: Get the released versions that belong to the specified project.

operation.name: mc_project_get_unreleased_versions
operation.documentation: Get the unreleased version that belong to the specified project.

operation.name: mc_project_get_attachments
operation.documentation: Get the attachments that belong to the specified project.

operation.name: mc_project_get_custom_fields
operation.documentation: Get the custom fields that belong to the specified project.

operation.name: mc_project_attachment_get
operation.documentation: Get the data for the specified project attachment.

operation.name: mc_project_attachment_add
operation.documentation: Submit a new project attachment.

operation.name: mc_project_attachment_delete
operation.documentation: Delete the project attachment with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_project_get_all_subprojects
operation.documentation: Get the subprojects ID of a specific project.

operation.name: mc_filter_get
operation.documentation: Get the filters defined for the specified project.

operation.name: mc_filter_get_issues
operation.documentation: Get the issues that match the specified filter and paging details. Pass "-1" for the per_page parameter to get all issues.

operation.name: mc_filter_get_issue_headers
operation.documentation: Get the issue headers that match the specified filter and paging details. Pass "-1" for the per_page parameter to get all issues.

operation.name: mc_filter_search_issue_headers
operation.documentation: Get the issue headers that match the custom filter and paging details.

operation.name: mc_filter_search_issues
operation.documentation: Get the issues that match the custom filter and paging details.

operation.name: mc_filter_search_issue_ids
operation.documentation: Get the issue ids that match the custom filter and paging details.

operation.name: mc_config_get_string
operation.documentation: Get the value for the specified configuration variable.

operation.name: mc_issue_checkin
operation.documentation: Notifies MantisBT of a check-in for the issue with the specified id.

operation.name: mc_user_pref_get_pref
operation.documentation: Get the value for the specified user preference.

operation.name: mc_user_profiles_get_all
operation.documentation: Get profiles available to the current user.

operation.name: mc_tag_get_all
operation.documentation: Gets all the tags.

operation.name: mc_tag_add
operation.documentation: Creates a tag.

operation.name: mc_tag_delete
operation.documentation: Deletes a tag.
